greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of Product_{k>=1} 1/(1 - x^k)^(p(k)-1), where p(k) = number of partitions of k (A000041).
comment: Convolution of the sequences A001970 and A010815.
link: Index entries for sequences related to partitions
mathematica: nmax = 38; CoefficientList[Series[Product[1/(1 - x^k)^(PartitionsP[k] - 1), {k, 1, nmax}], {x, 0, nmax}], x]
a[n_] := a[n] = If[n == 0, 1, Sum[Sum[d (PartitionsP[d] - 1), {d, Divisors[k]}] a[n - k], {k, 1, n}]/n]; Table[a[n], {n, 0, 38}]
results.author: _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, May 22 2018
